content.rendered:
Newly admitted students

Student Account Setup: Find out how to get your student accounts such as email, Blackboard, and La Verne Portal; requesting Internet access in the residence halls…

Current students

Technology Services:

  • Computer labs
  • How to set up Wireless Access at Main Campus, College of Law and Public Service and Regional Campuses
  • How to set up Wireless Access at Residence Halls
  • Free broadband Internet
  • Technology FAQ
  • Training Events and Resources

For any other technical information or problems, please contact the Unified Service Desk at (909) 448-4130 or help@laverne.edu.
